attributes.action: Make St. Georges Day a Bank Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Not only would it be a sign of true Patriotism for all English people, and put us on a par with the Welsh, The Scotch and the Irish and how Patriotic they all are with their respective Patron Saints, but we could also use it to Commemerate and Celebrate the Birth and Death of our undoubtedly best ever playwright: William Shakespear. What better reason do we need to help bring us in-line with our European neighbours who all have more Bank Holidays than we have.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
